bibl.title: Culture in Pieces. Essays on Ancient Texts in Honour of Peter Parsons.
bibl.note: 1 front., 14 figg. et 16 pll. n./bl. et coul.

The volume originated in a conference of the same title, held in Oxford in September 2006, to celebrate the 70th birthday of P.P., Regius Professor of Greek at Oxford from 1989 to 2003. 16 contributions. - Pp. v: Dedicatory poem [in Greek] by Colin Austin †; - vii-viii: D.O. and R.R., Preface; - 1-19: R.R. and D.O.: Introduction; - 323-333: Bibliography of P.P. [see in part. pp. 323-328: Contributions to The Oxyrhynchus Papyri]; - 335-342: Indices.
bibl.seg: 130 Parsons Peter John 170 Parsons Peter John
Obbink Dirk and Richard Rutherford (Edd.), Culture in Pieces. Essays on Ancient Texts in Honour of Peter Parsons.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2011, 8°, xviii-342 pp., 1 front., 14 figg. et 16 pll. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-0-19-929201-1. £80.

The volume originated in a conference of the same title, held in Oxford in September 2006, to celebrate the 70th birthday of P.P., Regius Professor of Greek at Oxford from 1989 to 2003. 16 contributions. - Pp. v: Dedicatory poem [in Greek] by Colin Austin †; - vii-viii: D.O. and R.R., Preface; - 1-19: R.R. and D.O.: Introduction; - 323-333: Bibliography of P.P. [see in part. pp. 323-328: Contributions to The Oxyrhynchus Papyri]; - 335-342: Indices.
